Posts.Content: Mar 13, 2011 01:12PM Sig wrote: Hi, 3 days ago I started having tightess in the dorsum of my right hand by the end of the day it was swollen to the point that I do not see my joinst and veins (which I do see in my other hand). Today I have almost no sensation when I touch the dorsum of my hand, (it like neuropathy) and  my fingers are colder then my other hand with a colder sensation. The size of both my wrists seems the same, however near my elbow it is a bit bigger than my other arm but not much. I had lymp node removed in Jan 2007. Is it possible that be LE or something else?  does it start in the hand or it is only the arm.  Sig
Posts.Title: VISIBLE SIGNS OF LYMPHEDEMA - A PICTORIAL LindaLou53 glennie19
